    A

    AddInventoryItem(String, int, int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a name, quantity, and minimum, add a new entry to the raw_inventory table
    addInventoryStock(int, int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an inventory item and an amount to add, increment the quantity value
    AddJunctionTable(int, int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a menuItemID and rawItemID, add a new entry to the raw_inventory table

    C

    calculateInventoryUsage(Vector<Integer>) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a vector of ints corresponding to amount of each menu item ordered, determine the inventory usage for each inventory item.
    countMenuItemsBetweenOrderIDs(int, int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a min and max order id, count number of times each menu item was ordered in that range.

    G

    generateProductUsage(String, String) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a start and end date, calculates the scaled amount used for each inventory item.
    getAllInventoryNames() - Static method in class Inventory
    Returns vector of strings containing all name values in raw_inventory table
    getInventoryCount(int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an inventory item, returns its corresponding quantity value
    getInventoryMin(int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an inventory item, returns its corresponding min value.
    getInventoryName(int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an inventory item, returns its corresponding name value
    getNextInventoryID() - Static method in class Inventory
    Returns the next available rawitemid and is used for adding inventory entries
    getNextJunctionID() - Static method in class Inventory
    Returns the next available junctionid and is used for adding inventory and menu entries
    getOrderIDRange(String, String) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a start and end date, return the range of order ids during that period.
    getRawInventory(int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an menu item, returns all raw inventory items associated with it

    I

    Inventory - Class in Unnamed Package
    Backend class for accessing and manipulating raw_inventory table values
    Inventory() - Constructor for class Inventory
     

    M

    makeInventoryChanges(Vector<Integer>) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a vector of ints corresponding to scaled amount each inventory product used, makes the necessary changes to the inventory quantity values

    R

    restockReport() - Static method in class Inventory
    Function that handles necessary inventory changes in the database for the current day of operation and returns a vector of formatted strings for all inventory items with quantity value below min value

    S

    scaleInventoryUsage(Vector<Integer>) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given a vector of ints corresponding to amount of times each inventory item was used in an order, scale to the real amount of product used.
    subtractInventoryStock(int, int) - Static method in class Inventory
    Given an ID of an inventory item and an amount to subtract, decrement the quantity value

    T

    todaysInventoryUsage() - Static method in class Inventory
    Determine the scaled inventory usage for each inventory item in the current day of operation.

    U

    underMin() - Static method in class Inventory
    Function that returns a formatted string for each inventory item below with quantity value below min value
